main event: An unidentified flying object was reported as a fireball explosion in the sky, followed by a circular cloud spreading by the wind.
interesting points: The explosion was described as making a big bang before extinguishing itself., The sighting occurred between 2309 to 2320 degrees ship bearings., Witnesses reported seeing another smaller ball of fire similar in dimensions to Jupiter., The fireball was observed at a high altitude of about 42 degrees visible in the sky., The description included a detailed account from the U.S. Air Force personnel aboard a ship.
sighted object: a fireball and a smaller ball of fire
